speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0069/2006 ) by Mr Őry, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on transitional arrangements restricting the free movement of workers on EU labour markets [ 2006/2036(INI) ].
original: President. The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0069/2006 ) by Mr Őry, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on transitional arrangements restricting the free movement of workers on EU labour markets [ 2006/2036(INI) ].
agenda_item: Transitional arrangements restricting the free movement of workers on EU labour markets (debate)
